ygData.subject: Re: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was considering picking up Archery, but I am 26th level already. I can get a nice bow, yes, but I wonder what use Archery will be to me? I typically pull
ygData.messageBody:
Jeremy Pollack wrote:
>
> From: "Jeremy Pollack" <jpollack@...>
>
> Yes we do, and our limit is 75 as well. Took me a while to figure that one
> out ... I was getting really frustrated as my skill didn't go up after that
> level!!! If you are asking whether to work on archery, however, I would
> highly reccomend it. It takes a year and a day to get up, but it is very
> worth it, especially when you are older and can afford a nice bow. I can't
> wait for a darkwood.
>
> > Do we have a maximum skill limit like the Palidans do in the catagory (I
> > think theirs is 75)?
>

I was considering picking up Archery, but I am 26th level already.
I can get a nice bow, yes, but I wonder what use Archery will be to me?
I typically pull with Darkness (may switch to Heat blood at 30th), so
pulling isn't issue. I suppose I could kite with darkness and a bow,
but that's pretty boring.

So just tell me a good reason to spend time and money on a new skill,
and I buy a darkwood tonight. Also, at level 26, will I be able to hit
anything with a 75 maxed skill?

Xilith T'Vyn <Obsidian Knights>
26th SK, Tunare
